title: misc/pprof: no support for /debug/pprof/block
body:
by **arnaud.lb**: 
Running "go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/block"; leads to the
following error:

FATAL ERROR: Did not specify profile file

Running "go tool pprof http://localhost:6060/debug/pprof/heap"; for instance
works as expected.

Using go version go1.1.2 linux/amd64
